attributes.action: Allow 16 year olds to drive restricted quadricycles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the moment people are suggesting ways of reducing accidents amongst young drivers,why don't we adopt the europewide regulations which allow 16 year olds to drive restricted quadricycles after training until age 18 when they can learn in a conventional car.This model works in the rest of europe why not here
